comments.body:
Add a comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/WRKampi/extensisq/pull/1
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

I've opened a PR upstream (https://github.com/WRKampi/extensisq/pull/1) to fix having to manually package the license file. In a future release if this PR is merged or if the license file is included in some other way, this comment is a visual reminder to check, and if the license file is in the source distribution, you can remove the comment and delete the manually packaged copy of the license.

I have made the modifications. The packaged file now contains the licence. I created a new version for this. Is this the only way to do it? Or did I make it more difficult that I needed to? It is my first contribution to conda forge.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@  summary: extend solve_ivp of scipy.integrate with OdeSolver objects
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
